actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 412(b) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to prohibit approval of certain air carrier agreements by the Civil Aeronautics Board, except in case of an emergency.

summary.text: Provides that any agreement between air carriers for controlling competition or regulating services, equipment or facilities shall be disapproved by the Civil Aeronautics Board. Provides for approval of such agreements for 180 days when substantial irreparable injury may result to the public or the air carriers. (Amends 49 U.S.C. 1382 (b))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 412(b) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to prohibit approval of certain air carrier agreements by the Civil Aeronautics Board, except in case of an emergency.
